resources.string:
Hello, this game has rules and short description, please check it: 
 - here are 23 questions and 4 variants of answer 
 - you have just 20 seconds for each question 
 - adding points is equal seconds that lost on period 
 - if you are not given answer on time, you will skip uncountable case 
 - win those gamer who makes less wrong, and select correct button faster 
 - please check you Internet connecting 
 If you are ready, please input your name and push on START! 
 Good luck!
